comment.author: 84343825@N00
comment._content: I did a bit of research into this photo, and learned the details about the excavation. Please see my blog post about it, linked below. in brief, it's likely that the man in the photo is either François or Paul Ellenberger, who found these fossils near the village trash heap. The excavation was done with assistance from AW Crompton, a paleontologist who at the time was with the National Museum in Bloemfontein. The bones have never been described formally. More: chasmosaurs.blogspot.com/2011/04/dinosaurs-in-trash-heap....

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: That's absolutely fascinating. Thank you very much for sharing your findings with us.
